53:       def after_initialize(&block)
54:         ActiveSupport.on_load(:after_initialize, :yield => true, &block)

app_generators()

Holds generators configuration: 

  config.app_generators do |g|
    g.orm             :datamapper, :migration => true
    g.template_engine :haml
    g.test_framework  :rspec
  end

If you want to disable color in console, do: 

  config.app_generators.colorize_logging = false
This method is also aliased as generators

[ show source ]

      # File railties/lib/rails/railtie/configuration.rb, line 31
31:       def app_generators
32:         @@generators ||= Rails::Configuration::Generators.new
33:         if block_given?
34:           yield @@generators
35:         else
36:           @@generators
37:         end
38:       end
app_middleware()

This allows you to modify the application’s middlewares from Engines.

All operations you run on the app_middleware will be replayed on the application once it is defined and the default_middlewares are created

[ show source ]

      # File railties/lib/rails/railtie/configuration.rb, line 15
15:       def app_middleware
16:         @@app_middleware ||= Rails::Configuration::MiddlewareStackProxy.new
17:       end

Private Instance methods
method_missing(name, *args, &blk)

[ show source ]

      # File railties/lib/rails/railtie/configuration.rb, line 71
71:       def method_missing(name, *args, &blk)
72:         if name.to_s =~ /=$/
73:           @@options[$`.to_sym] = args.first
74:         elsif @@options.key?(name)
75:           @@options[name]
76:         else
77:           super
78:         end
79:       end
